mapper.select: SELECT fi.* , qr.rez_flight_start_date, qr.rez_flight_end_date, qr.rez_flight_start_place, qr.rez_flight_end_place FROM flight_info AS fi JOIN (SELECT rf.* FROM reserved_flight AS rf JOIN travel_info AS ti ON rf.travel_no = ti.travel_no WHERE user_no = #{param1} AND ti.travel_reservation_status = "예약됨") AS qr ON fi.flight_no = qr.flight_no
